body: We are excited to host our annual Antique Power Exhibition this year, featuring Allis Chalmers Tractors & Waterloo Contract Engines! Enjoy a fun-filled weekend with antique tractors, engines, miniature trains, blacksmithing, sawmill & thrashing demonstrations, a bustling flea market, and much more! Click the button below to learn more.

header: Where the Past has a Future!
body: The Illiana Antique Power Association is a non-profit organization dedicated to the preservation of our early rural way of life and the mechanical marvels that changed farming forever.
Join us on Facebook to stay up-to-date on all Illiana news, events, and announcements! We share photos, videos, meeting notices, and much more!
